bibl.title: Colonial and Cultural Identities in Parthian and Roman Dura-Europos.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Welles and the Greco-Macedonian 'aristocracy' of Dura-Europos. - Greco-Macedonian Cultural Identity at Dura-Europos? - Double Naming and the Europaioi in Parthian Dura-Europos [compared with double naming in Ptolemaic Egypt]. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Aspects of the Roman East. Papers in Honour of Professor Fergus Millar. I.

bibl.seg: Pollard Nigel, Colonial and Cultural Identities in Parthian and Roman Dura-Europos.

Richard Alston and Sam N.C. Lieu (Edd.), Aspects of the Roman East. Papers in Honour of Professor Fergus Millar. I = Studia antiqua Australiensia. 3 (Turnhout - Macquarie University, 2007) pp. 81-102.

Introduction. - Welles and the Greco-Macedonian 'aristocracy' of Dura-Europos. - Greco-Macedonian Cultural Identity at Dura-Europos? - Double Naming and the Europaioi in Parthian Dura-Europos [compared with double naming in Ptolemaic Egypt]. - Conclusions.
